column4: hey can anyone guide me to configure wireless connection in ubuntu
paste the output from lspci and lsusb to paste.ubuntu.com, please. We need to know exactly which wifi card chipset you have.
output of lspci and lsusb to paste.ubuntu.com. Motherboard type doesn't tell us what wifi chipset you're using.
dunno if there's a graphical tool for it, but the command-line one is ufw (see man ufw)
